name: Snow Man's Land
description:
Done in a 5 day game jam at LSBU with students across the year making a one screen game with the theme of "snow clearing."

Use the mouse to select a platform then click a rock tower to build. Other towers are an upgrade of a rock tower that have different effects, ranges and damage values.

Designer ~ Joe George

Coders ~ Steven Mead, Saul Catlin, Alex Bates

Sound ~ Daniel Carvalho Marques, Jamie Notarantonio

Modeling ~ Pat Turner

UI Art ~ Ben Goodfellow

Texturing ~ Victor Alarcon Prieto
